description: Describes a network interface attribute. You can specify only one attribute at a time.

parameters.name: NetworkInterfaceId
parameters.description: The ID of the network interface.

nested_items.name: Attachment
nested_items.description: The attachment (if any) of the network interface.

nested_items.name: AttachTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp indicating when the attachment initiated.

nested_items.name: AttachmentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the network interface attachment.

nested_items.name: DeleteOnTermination
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the network interface is deleted when the instance is terminated.

nested_items.name: DeviceIndex
nested_items.description: The device index of the network interface attachment on the instance.

nested_items.name: NetworkCardIndex
nested_items.description: The index of the network card.

nested_items.name: InstanceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the instance.

nested_items.name: InstanceOwnerId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the owner of the instance.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The attachment state.

nested_items.name: EnaSrdSpecification
nested_items.description: Configures ENA Express for the network interface that this action attaches to the instance.

nested_items.name: EnaSrdEnabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether ENA Express is enabled for the network interface.

nested_items.name: EnaSrdUdpSpecification
nested_items.description: Configures ENA Express for UDP network traffic.

nested_items.name: EnaSrdUdpEnabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether UDP traffic to and from the instance uses ENA Express. To specify this setting, you must first enable ENA Express.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the network interface.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The attribute value. The value is case-sensitive.

nested_items.name: Groups
nested_items.description: The security groups associated with the network interface.

nested_items.name: GroupId
nested_items.description: The ID of the security group.

nested_items.name: GroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the security group.

nested_items.name: NetworkInterfaceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the network interface.

nested_items.name: SourceDestCheck
nested_items.description: Indicates whether source/destination checking is enabled.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The attribute value. The valid values are true or false.

nested_items.name: AssociatePublicIpAddress
nested_items.description: Indicates whether to assign a public IPv4 address to a network interface. This option can be enabled for any network interface but will only apply to the primary network interface (eth0).
